mapper.sql: ${alias}.id, ${alias}.media_id, SUM(${alias}.reqs), SUM(${alias}.bids), SUM(${alias}.errs), SUM(${alias}.imps), SUM(${alias}.clks), SUM(${alias}.vimps), SUM(${alias}.vclks), SUM(${alias}.income), ${alias}.created_time, ${alias}.updated_time
mapper.select: SELECT ,m.name mediaName , rm.adspace_id, a.name adspaceName ,rm.date ,rm.hour FROM mad_report_media rm LEFT JOIN mad_sys_media m ON rm.media_id = m.id LEFT JOIN mad_sys_adspace a ON rm.adspace_id = a.id WHERE rm.date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND rm.date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND rm.media_id = #{mediaId} GROUP BY rm.media_id , rm.adspace_id , rm.date , rm.hour ORDER BY rm.media_id

SELECT ,m.name mediaName , rm.adspace_id, a.name adspaceName ,rm.date ,rm.hour FROM mad_report_media_rt rm LEFT JOIN mad_sys_media m ON rm.media_id = m.id LEFT JOIN mad_sys_adspace a ON rm.adspace_id = a.id WHERE rm.date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND rm.date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND rm.media_id = #{mediaId} GROUP BY rm.media_id , rm.adspace_id , rm.date , rm.hour ORDER BY rm.media_id

SELECT , m.name mediaName, rm.location, IF(l.domestic=0, '其他', IF(l.code LIKE '%0000', l.name, l.name)) cityName, IF(l.domestic=0, '其他', IF(l.code LIKE '%0000', l.name, lp.name)) provinceName , rm.adspace_id, a.name adspaceName ,rm.date ,rm.hour FROM mad_report_media_location rm LEFT JOIN mad_sys_media m ON rm.media_id = m.id LEFT JOIN mad_sys_adspace a ON rm.adspace_id = a.id LEFT JOIN mad_dict_location l ON rm.location = l.code LEFT JOIN mad_dict_location lp ON l.parent_code = lp.code WHERE rm.date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND rm.date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND rm.media_id = #{mediaId} GROUP BY rm.media_id, rm.location , rm.adspace_id , rm.date , rm.hour ORDER BY rm.media_id
mapper.insert: insert into mad_report_media (id, media_id, adspace_id, date, hour, reqs, bids, errs, imps, clks, vimps, vclks, income, created_time, updated_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mediaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adspaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{hour,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{reqs,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bids,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{errs,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{imps,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{clks,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{vimps,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{vclks,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{income,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into mad_report_media
id,
media_id,
adspace_id,
date,
hour,
reqs,
bids,
errs,
imps,
clks,
vimps,
vclks,
income,
created_time,
updated_time,

#{mediaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{adspaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update mad_report_media
media_id = #{mediaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
adspace_id = #{adspaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE},
hour = #{hour,jdbcType=TINYINT},
reqs = #{reqs,jdbcType=BIGINT},
bids = #{bids,jdbcType=BIGINT},
errs = #{errs,jdbcType=BIGINT},
imps = #{imps,jdbcType=BIGINT},
clks = #{clks,jdbcType=BIGINT},
vimps = #{vimps,jdbcType=BIGINT},
vclks = #{vclks,jdbcType=BIGINT},
income = #{income,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mad_report_media set media_id = #{mediaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adspace_id = #{adspaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, hour = #{hour,jdbcType=TINYINT}, reqs = #{reqs,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bids = #{bids,jdbcType=BIGINT}, errs = #{errs,jdbcType=BIGINT}, imps = #{imps,jdbcType=BIGINT}, clks = #{clks,jdbcType=BIGINT}, vimps = #{vimps,jdbcType=BIGINT}, vclks = #{vclks,jdbcType=BIGINT}, income = #{income,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
